Dear {{lead.Last Name:default=Valued Customer}},
FACT – The ADS-B Mandate is fast approaching! By 2020, all aircraft operating in the U.S and Europe will be required to transmit ADS-B positioning information in compliance with DO-260B — the deadline is January 1st for U.S airspace, June 8th for European. FACT – Time is running out! There are literally thousands of non-compliant aircraft requiring upgrade prior to the 2020 deadline. With upgrades taking in excess of 100 man hours per aircraft time is running out. FACT – Your operation is a risk if you are not compliant! After the 2020 deadline, non-compliant aircraft could be grounded! Even if you’re not grounded operators will be subjected to delays, inefficient routing and higher fuel burn. Are you willing to take the risk? FACT – The longer you wait – the more it will cost! As the 2020 mandates approach the cost of the upgrade will increase as parts and hanger availability declines. If you haven't budgeted for ADS-B in 2017 make sure you do for 2018! FACT – Honeywell can help! Do you have a crystal-clear plan for securing the required hardware and upgrading your fleet in time to comply with these mandates? If not, Honeywell can help. We are offering a spares exchange (SPEX) option upgrade for Pilatus PC-12NG aircraft currently equipped with KXP 2290 non-ADS-B Transponder. Access to the SPEX exchange pool will facilitate the rapid exchange of your transponder and minimize any aircraft downtime during the upgrade. TALK TO OUR SPECIALISTS TODAY AND DEVELOP YOUR 2020 VISION.
